name: Hıdırellez!
description:
A Hidirellez-themed game for kids who can't go outside to jump over fire. Make a wish, jump over fire three times and pray to God to your make your wishes real!

Instructions: Press right-arrow repeatedly to run fast enough. You'll wrap around the screen. When you get close to fire, press Space bar to jump. Do this three times to win. (Thanks to /u/JohnTheBold for this!)
